query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `superpowers` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `instantResearch` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `globalComparison` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `legalInterpretation` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `caseSearch` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `cloneAbility` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `perfectMemory` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `alwaysOnline` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `instantReply` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `needsPrediction` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `riskWarning` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `bestTiming` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `marketRadar` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `multiLanguage` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `globalInfo` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `emotionSense` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `persuasionMaster` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `styleAdaptation` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `researchDepth` enum('quick','standard','deep') DEFAULT 'standard',
  `followUpIntensity` int DEFAULT 3,
  `persuasionStyle` enum('gentle','balanced','aggressive') DEFAULT 'balanced',
  `superpowerLevel` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `totalConversationsHandled` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `customersRemembered` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `afterHoursMessages` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `researchReportsGenerated` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `predictionsAccurate` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `superpowers_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `superpowers_userId_unique` UNIQUE(`userId`)
)
command:

  `instantReply` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `needsPrediction` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `riskWarning` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `bestTiming` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `marketRadar` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `multiLanguage` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `globalInfo` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `emotionSense` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `persuasionMaster` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `styleAdaptation` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `researchDepth` enum('quick','standard','deep') DEFAULT 'standard',
  `followUpIntensity` int DEFAULT 3,
  `persuasionStyle` enum('gentle','balanced','aggressive') DEFAULT 'balanced',
  `superpowerLevel` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `totalConversationsHandled` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `customersRemembered` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `afterHoursMessages` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `researchReportsGenerated` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `predictionsAccurate` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `superpowers_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `superpowers_userId_unique` UNIQUE(`userId`)
)
